sub_title: Customer Service Servant supervisor EMEA Fibers
summary: Experienced Customer Service Representative with a demonstrated history of working in the chemicals industry. Strong support professional skilled in Negotiation, Sales, Management, Marketing, and Time Management.

school.name: Rotterdam School of Management, Erasmus University

education.field_of_study: Letras - Língua Inglesa e Literaturas de Língua Inglesa

profile_positions.description:
I am responsible for leading and developing a team of 10 Customer Service Representative. My main objective is to ensure the team is well equipped and supported enabling them to deliver the best of their talent as a team, resulting on excellence in customer service experience and business results. It is my responsibility to ensure the team has space to develop and grow, share their ideas, and work together in good work environment. In parallel, I am part of several supply chain/logistics projects focusing on productivity, efficiency, innovation, and cost savings to ensure we deliver the business expected results. 

•Analytical skills, usage of several Power BI dashboards/SOAR/ Excel steering teams to focus on main priorities.
•Team building, ensuring people is continuously coached and developed, have a balanced workload, and feel empowered to take decisions and work independently. 
•Strong communication skills providing leadership with visibility to make quick decision.
•Project management skills, providing structure, timeline, actions and follow up ensuring the right team is together to start and finalize projects. 
•Striving for productivity, efficiency and innovation ensuring teams are aligned with regards to their R&R.  Involved supply chain projects:
 - Outsourcing of operational tasks to India. 
-   Supporting the implementation of SAP, aligning Process and Procedures, R&R with the new plant in Spain.
- Automation projects focusing in cost savings but also efficiency gains. 
- Sales Force Insight Driven Customer Service - Having CSRs delivering value and working/ communicating closely to the business and sales team. 
•Embracing working with complexity in logistics and supply chain, being part of difficult customer negotiations and ensuring we deliver the best possible by thinking out of the box.
•Granted Outperforming Performance results and several bonus which recognized the efforts-maintained team stability despite a year of unprecedented challenges.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Team Lead EMEA Fibers

profile_positions.description:
Analysis of logistics operations for service level improvement as well as delivery reliability. 
People training, refreshment, mentoring.
Coordinating efforts of staff to yield maximum productivity. Monitoring team performance and steering to right direction. 
Providing feedback promptly. Doing performance review and development plans. In charge of 2 direct reports steering and growth.
Encouraging morale and each employee’s importance to overall goals
excellent communication and interpersonal skills, leadership, supervisory skills, time management and a result-oriented attitude.
Project manager for:
Sample process improvements  
Open order excellence, issues with stakeholders of supply chain (service providers, warehousing, order entry, customs,, logistics, credit) are analyzed and improvement for the process. 
Involved with Automation and productivity improvement projects for Customer Service related subjects including logistics operations.
Problem solver, very creative, thinking out of the box
Positive attitude 
Team work 
Customer and people
 Recognition bonus granted with regards to operational excellence, team work and customer, team and business focus.
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Customer Service Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Order process from inquiry to invoicing. 
Entering pricing in the system.
Sales support 
Order and invoice handling, including adjustments to customers accounts. Complaint handling.
Monitoring orders against forecast
Creating and assessing various reports, identifying and correcting irregularities.
Indentifying opportunities for cost savings in order process and applying it.
Tracking orders, delays, advancements with several shipping lines in order to avoid delays and keep customer and business updated
Knowledge of E, C,F,D incoterms 
Logistics planner air, truck, ocean deliveries 
SAP experience 
Knowledge with international trade, import/export and related documents for customs clearance as well as international contracts.
Power user with company online interface Customer Center
Trainee for Customer Center internally and externally
Experience with Windows, Outlook, Power Point, Excel and Word.
Very flexible
Driven for customer experience and excellence in service deliveries
Granted bonus for successfully implement to the Fiber Business Customer Center.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service representative

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible for the following core order management activities and responsible to ensure orders and enquiries move efficiently through the order system
•	Receive orders and enquires from customers with all necessary information to execute order effectively.
•	Manage and work efficiently through our customer gateway systems for order taking.
•	Acknowledge and confirm order/enquiry to the customer promptly with product availability, pricing, and estimated date of delivery.
•	Ensure pricing is correct in system and escalete discrepancies to in charge department (invoice, sales or system support).
•	Follow up outstanding enquiries and quotations.
•	Follow strict credit policy and checking the order value to maintain customers within authorised credit limits and policies. 
•	Supporting the businesses. Working with Account Managers and other Head Office teams to achieve business specific objectives and goals.
•	Available for emergency on call duty to give customers 24/7 accessibility for urgent order requests.
•	Monitor On Time in Full deliveries (OTIF) successes, failures, and proactively seeking to improve results. 
•	Ensure data is accurately entered and maintained in all Customer Service and data collection systems, minimizing errors and resultant financial losses.
•	Exhibit strong Team Player characteristics, constructive communication and active listening skills at all times.
•	Meet deadlines through good time management and allocate priorities daily.
•	Strong service orientated - Ability to set and maintain high standards of customer service, actively looking for ways to satisfy the customer, providing extra miles.
•	Highly organized and able to prioritize and balance multiple tasks effectively.
•	Positive atitude with customer and colleagues being able too work well under pressure.
•	Granted with Bonus by thinking outside the box and providing excellent service to customer in critical situation.
profile_positions.title: Order Manager

profile_positions.description:
Customer Service Agent: 
•	Customer Service Agent at FedEx since September 2003.
•	Member of the E-mail group within Customer Service since November 2003.
•	Sponsor for FedEx email group since November 2005.      

Main Task and Characteristics
•	Deal with different and pressure situations on a daily basis.
•	Positive attitude, providing the necessary support to customers, in a courteous and dedicated way.
•	Daily CS routine like quotations, support on export and import procedures for customers, pick up requests with exceptions, Dangerous Good transport information, formal export information. 
•	Interactions with other departments like Sales, Operations, Import, Export, Dangerous Good, Marketing, Trace, Web, Automation and Billing.
•	Business focus, negotiating best prices to customers with Sales Dept and asking for the business.
•	Customer Focus, providing upset customers a positive customer experience and gain their loyalty.
•	Review of FedEx web page and FedEx.com, providing relevant information for a friendly use. 
•	Project development at e-mail department in order to standardize the process making it more efficient and professional.
•	Support to Call Center agents to cover supervisor agents.
•	Granted with 3 Bravo Zulu certificate due to e-mail project creation and development and due to record of e-mails answered in two months.
profile_positions.title: Customer representative
